oai_dc:dc.dc:title: W.G. Thuss Studio portrait of an unidentified couple, Nashville, Tennessee, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A studio photograph (1 cabinet card) of an unidentified couple. The verso is illustrative with the studio name of W. G. Thuss Studio, located at the corner and College and Union Streets in downtown Nashville. Forms part of the Boatright Family Photograph Collection, donated by Linda Ross Lee. 1 cabinet card.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Boatright family
W. G. Thuss Studio (Nashville, Tenn.)
